TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content: I wish  @TopHeavy11 had posted a wish.

I cant grant that wish because @TopHeavy11 does not read the game rules.

 

I wish people would read the game rules.

Granted, but no one reads the rules of anything else ever again and the world collapses into anarchy.

 

I wish yesterday never happened.

Granted, but tomorrow will also never happen.

 

I wish people (coughcough @EliasDanger coughcough) would stop accusing me of not reading the rules.

Edited April 26, 2016 by TopHeavy11

They stop accusing you of not reading the rules, because you and the memory of you are suddenly erased from everyone's memory. Who was I talking about? I don't seem to remember...

I wish my phone had an atomic clock in it.

Edited April 27, 2016 by cubinator
Autocorrect and grammar bet hard

Granted but the atom splits and goes boom

 

I wish aliens would just come out and admit they are visiting us.

Granted, but after doing that, they destroy planet earth.

I wish for BadS 3D modeling and texturing skills.

Granted, but you become SO good at it you waste away on the computer, neglecting to eat, drink, or sleep, and you eventually die.

 

I wish I existed in the 4th dimension.

Wish granted, but according to Stephen Hawking, the 4th dimension folds on itself. You're now paper thin...

I wish I didn't have to grade final exams or term papers...

Granted, but you grade 3.2848294810487 x 10^108391929919292 quizzes (fast exams) each day.

I wish I had vacations right now. @cubinator

Edited April 27, 2016 by Q-ver KSP
Wish and Call

Granted. You didn't wish for anything, so your wishing ability is suspended for the rest of time eternal.

I wish that it was Friday already.

This wish will be granted, but you have to wait two days for shipping, so it was kind of a wasted wish.

I wish i ruled the world.

Granted, but you get to rule Moho. Didn't specify which world.

I wish I didn't have to worry about paying for things ever again.

Granted. Your don't have to worry about anything, strictly speaking, but if you want to live in modern society you still have to pay for things.

I wish the mobile editor wasn't so borked.

Denied. I feel your pain tho

I wish for people to at least notice me IRL

Granted, but now you're so popular that you don't have time for anything.

I wish to win 1500$ so I can buy those parts for my new gaming computer.

Granted, but your new computer has recently been used by a terrorist, and you are found guilty by association.

 

I wish that @SpaceplaneAddict and @max_creative would hate Dres like the rest of us.

Your wish failed miserably because I have too much of a kind heart.

 

I wish for a wish of wishes to make a wish for more fun.

Your wish is granted. Dres lovers rejoice over their wildest wishes about Dres come true, which does bring them more fun. The bad news is that you're in complete misery now.

I wish all I had left to grade were three final exams...

Granted. The Earth is destroyed, annihilating all but those three final exams. Those will be all you have left to grade...ever...

I wish that it would stop raining here.

Granted, it starts hailing and doesn't stop for three days.

I wish I didn't keep forgetting which forum game I was in.

Wish granted. The Forum Games no longer exist, too.

 

I wish that I could taunt the Magic Boulder.

Granted, but you get arrested by the Thought Police for thinking too much about freedom regarding what you can and cannot do to the Magic Boulder.

I wish for a chuck of aerogel large enough to weigh the same as my small block of tungsten.

Granted. The Magc Boulder responds by destroying your house.

I wish I could figure out what keeps crashing KSP 64bit.

Granted: The Kraken. You can't do anything about it, of course...

I wish my Discovery 1 model actually flew...
